title: New secretaries appointed to two state ministries
content: New secretaries were appointed to two state ministries today (February 18), says the Presidentâ€™s Media Division (PMD).Accordingly, Mr. K. G. Wijesiri will now serve as the Secretary to the State Ministry of Tanks, Reservoirs and Irrigation Development related to Rural Paddy Fields.Meanwhile, Mr. S.D. Padikorala was appointed to the State Ministry of Development of Sugarcane, Maize, Cashew, Pepper, Cinnamon, Cloves, Betel Production and Promotion of Allied Products and Export.
